        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2341</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflex arc and actions in humans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexbogen und Tätigkeiten in den Menschen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arc réflexe et actions chez l'homme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arco reflexo e ações nos seres humanos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arco riflesso ed azioni in esseri umani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακλαστικές τόξο και ενέργειες στους ανθρώπους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arco reflejo y acciones en seres humanos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates the reflex arc in humans and the resulting reflex action</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nervous system</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates der Reflexbogen in
den Menschen und in der resultierenden Reflextätigkeit</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates l'arc réflexe chez
l'homme et l'action réflexe résultante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates o arco reflexo nos 
seres humanos e na ação reflexo resultante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates l'arco riflesso in
esseri umani e nell'azione riflessa risultante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates το ανακλαστικό τόξο 
στους ανθρώπους και την προκύπτουσα ανακλαστική ενέργεια</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates el arco reflejo en
seres humanos y la acción refleja que resulta</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nervöses System</string>

          <keyword>
